text: The bottom floor was five cubits wide,6:6 5 cubits is approximately 7.5 feet or 2.3 meters; also in verses 10 and 24. the middle floor six cubits,6:6 6 cubits is approximately 9 feet or 2.7 meters. and the third floor seven cubits.6:6 7 cubits is approximately 10.5 feet or 3.2 meters. He also placed offset ledges around the outside of the temple, so that nothing would be inserted into its walls.
